data.title: Global Finance Na Pamatay
data.meta_description: Global Finance Na Pamatay - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This document provides an overview of global finance and international monetary systems. It discusses key concepts such as emerging markets, global capital markets, assets, institutions, and linkages in the global financial system. It also summarizes the evolution of international monetary systems from bimetallism before 1875 to the classical gold standard, interwar period, Bretton Woods system, and flexible exchange rate regime since 1973. The balance of payments and its components including the current account and capital account are also introduced.
